description: The ISOM Faculty Endowed Scholarship is open to declared majors in Management Information Systems or Operations & Supply Chain Management. Students must have completed at least 45 hours at the time of application and cannot be graduating prior to Fall 2023. Eligibility Requirements Declared majors in Management Information Systems or Operations & Supply Chain Management Completed at least 45 hours Cannot be graduating prior to Fall 2024 Preferred APICS student chapter member or student involved in other university-related student leadership activities

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
